data.message: We have 32 turkeys, several cases of soda and water, a bushel of Apples donated so far. Donations of just over $500 in cash or gift card forum have also been received. AOTV and Athol Daily News have been made aware of the event and will advertise. We are still in need of more volunteers as well as donations. PLEASE SHARE THIS EVENT PAGE AND ASK YOUR FRIENDS TO DO THE SAME. Go viral
Sponsors Poster Complete. This will be on the front table when you enter the Elks.
Thank you in advance to New Skool Entertainment for donating sound to the A&E Christmas Dinner celebration.

Thank you Kevin for volunteering your time as Santa for the upcoming A&E Christmas Dinner Celebration 

https://m.facebook.com/Santavisitsyou
Thank you Ashley Tourigny for your generous donation towards the A&E dinner celebration.
Thank you Joan Carmichael Victoria and Barbara Whittemore for your donations to the A&E Christmas Dinner:)
Thank you Cindy Britt for your donation to the A&E Christmas Dinner
Thank you Key Performance for you generous donation of $100 to the A&E Christmas Dinner Celebration.
Thank you St Mary's of Orange for your donation of $200.
Just met with Lilie from the Red Apple Farm. Thank you Red Apple Farm for the donation of apples which will be used for our apple crisp dessert
Would love to help! :)
Thank you Bobbie Carr and Kailey Carr for your donation of 5 turkeys today.
Thank you to Don and Linda Knapp for their donation of $20 towards the A&E Christmas Dinner. Their contribution bought 2 turkeys:)
A big THANK YOU to Andys and The Oak Shop who donated 10 Turkeys this morning
Thank you Donna Billiel For your donation of 3 Turkeys this morning.

As of today we have 27 Turkeys, more than halfway to our goal of 40. Cans of soda will be next on our list for those with an interest in still donating. Thanks so much everyone for your support thus far.
Eric Olson, anyone have decor? What time are you getting the hall, do you have a group started to set up?
Thank you Ashley Walker and family for the donation :)
We made this weekends paper:)
A&E has purchased 2 Turkeys today
Thank you Jenn LeBlanc and your children for the donation of 4 turkeys

We are accepting donations of Turkeys and or Gift Cards to either Hannaford or Market Basket to help with the cost of food for this event. All left over food will be brought to local police, fire, and hospital staff. Volunteers WANTED! Also PLEASE share!
Thank you Red Apple Farm and Tech One Computers for donating to our dinner celebration.
Please Share!
Let me know what you need help with. Would love to help out. I believe I have a few extra Christmas Wreaths I'm able to donate if you need some decorations!
